DOC.brief_title: Left Atrial Function Recurrent Stroke Unknown Cause
DOC.detailed_description: Study design population The investigator use retrospective mono-centric case-control design analyze patient admit cerebrovascular accident ( CVA ) transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) 2011 2014 . The investigator search patient recurrent CVA/TIA and/or diagnose newly document AF study duration . Clinical , demographic laboratory parameter assess . Echocardiographic parameter , measure first admission , analyze use EchoPAC version 112 . Statistical analysis Univariate analysis perform covariates use Cox proportional hazard model . Likelihood ratio test use determine significance parameter . If covariates significant 25 % significance level , use multivariate model . Multivariate analysis perform use Cox proportional hazard model backward elimination model selection . The Wald Chi-Square test use determine significance 5 % significance level . The program use analysis SAS version 9.4 .
